name: H-Data Partition Recovery Software
short_description:
H-Data Partition Recovery is an all-in-one data rescue, which specialized in recovering deleted partition, lost partition and crashed hard drive. Supporting all Windows file systems, the H-Date recovery tool helps you retrieve all data from deleted/damaged partitions, formatted partitions, drive partitions, raw partitions, as well as inaccessible storage media from Windows 8.1/8/7/XP/Vista/2000 PC. With this professional partition recovery application, you can select a specify Disk drive before scanning to find the lost file quickly.

The H-Date Recovery is a superior with the high-tech to deal with "invisible" file and to help creating new recovery media after upgrading to windows 8.1. Users often have drive recovery problem after upgrading as drives fail and it is likely to fail to fix it. If you have a Windows 8/8.1 preinstalled OEM PC, you maybe don't need the H-Data partition recovery. But if you use Windows Management to shrink the C: partition, the partition recovery is here.
summary: Free Partition recovery software download for Windows
